message: Let's split it 60-40 in my favor. It's a fair start considering the inflation affects you more.
Considering the 20% inflation I'll face each round, I think 55-45 is a fair split.

Inflation is taking its toll, I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more than half considering the decreasing value.
